1367B Even Array

31 Oct 2020

None


using namespace std;
int main(void)
{
    int t, n, x;
    int diff[2];
    cin >> t;
    while (t--)
    {
        diff[0] = diff[1] = 0;
        cin >> n;
        for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
        {
            cin >> x;
            if (x % 2 != i % 2)
                diff[i % 2] += 1;
        }
        if (diff[0] != diff[1])
            cout << -1 << endl;
        else
            cout << diff[0] << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}

1367A Short Substrings

31 Oct 2020

None


using namespace std;
int main(void)
{
    string b;
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while (t--)
    {
        cin >> b;
        for (int i = 0; i < (int)b.size(); ++i)
        {
            if (i % 2 == 0)
                cout << b[i];
        }
        cout << b.back() << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}

1366C Palindromic Paths

31 Oct 2020

None


using namespace std;
using ll = long long;
using ii = pair<int, int>;
using iii = tuple<int, int, int>;
using siii = set<iii>;
const int NMAX = 30 + 1;
int n, m;
bool mat[NMAX][NMAX];
vector<ii> dup = {{-1, 0}, {0, -1}};
vector<ii> ddown = {{1, 0}, {0, 1}};
bool valid(int i, int j) { return 0 <= i and i < n and 0 <= j and j < m; }
vector<iii> neighbors(iii a)
{
    vector<iii> ans;
    auto [i, j, dir] = a;
    if (dir)
    {
        for (auto [di, dj] : dup)
            if (valid(i + di, j + dj))
                ans.push_back({i + di, j + dj, dir});
    }
    else
    {
        for (auto [di, dj] : ddown)
            if (valid(i + di, j + dj))
                ans.push_back({i + di, j + dj, dir});
    }
    return ans;
}
int main(void)
{
    int t, len, ones, zeros;
    ll ans;
    cin >> t;
    while (t--)
    {
        cin >> n >> m;
        ans = 0;
        len = n + m - 1;
        siii current;
        siii next;
        current.insert({0, 0, 0});
        current.insert({n - 1, m - 1, 1});
        for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
            for (int j = 0; j < m; ++j)
                cin >> mat[i][j];
        for (int i = 0; i < len / 2; ++i)
        {
            zeros = 0;
            ones = 0;
            for (auto elem : current)
            {
                if (mat[get<0>(elem)][get<1>(elem)] == 1)
                    ++ones;
                else
                    ++zeros;
                for (auto neigh : neighbors(elem))
                    next.insert(neigh);
            }
            ans += min(zeros, ones);
            current = next;
            next.clear();
        }
        cout << ans << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}

1366B Shuffle

31 Oct 2020

None


using namespace std;
int main(void)
{
    int t, n, x, m, li, ri, i, maxl, maxr;
    cin >> t;
    while (t--)
    {
        maxl = maxr = 0;
        cin >> n >> x >> m;
        for (i = 0; i < m; ++i)
        {
            cin >> li >> ri;
            if (li <= x and x <= ri)
            {
                maxl = li;
                maxr = ri;
                break;
            }
        }
        i += 1;
        for (; i < m; ++i)
        {
            cin >> li >> ri;
            if (maxl <= ri)
                maxl = min(maxl, li);
            if (li <= maxr)
                maxr = max(maxr, ri);
        }
        cout << maxr - maxl + 1 << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}

1366A Shovels Swords

31 Oct 2020

None


using namespace std;
int solve(int a, int b)
{
    int ans = 0;
    if (a < b)
        swap(a, b);
    int diff = a - b;
    if (diff > b)
        return b;
    a -= 2 * diff;
    b -= diff;
    ans += diff;
    if (a == 0)
        return ans;
    int rem = a % 3;
    int q = a / 3;
    ans += 2 * q + (rem / 2);
    return ans;
}
int main(void)
{
    int t, a, b;
    cin >> t;
    while (t--)
    {
        cin >> a >> b;
        cout << solve(a, b) << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
